scripts.postinstall: node -e "var fs=require('fs'); var paths = [{path: '../components',link: 'node_modules/components'},{path: '../core',link: 'node_modules/core'},{path: '../config', link: 'node_modules/config' }]; paths.forEach(item=>{ fs.exists(item.link,function(e){e||fs.symlinkSync(item.path,item.link,'dir')}); });"
